verses.roman:
raghunātha-dāsera sadā prabhu-saṅge sthiti
tāṅra mukhe śuni' likhi kariyā pratīti

synonyms: raghunātha-dāsera—of Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī; sadā—always; prabhu-saṅge—with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sthiti—living; tāṅra mukhe—from his mouth; śuni'-hearing; likhi—I write; kariyā pratīti—accepting in total.
translation: Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī lived continuously with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. I am simply recording whatever I have heard from him. Although common men do not believe in these pastimes, I believe in them totally.
